sushi.title: Salmon Nigiri
sushi.description: Fresh raw salmon served over lightly seasoned sushi rice.

sushi.title: Tuna Nigiri
sushi.description: Lean cuts of raw tuna placed atop hand-pressed sushi rice.

sashimi.title: Salmon Sashimi
sashimi.description: Thick slices of premium raw salmon served without rice.

sashimi.title: Tuna Sashimi
sashimi.description: Fresh raw tuna sliced and presented in traditional style.

rolls.title: California Roll
rolls.description: Crab meat, avocado, and cucumber rolled in seasoned rice and seaweed.

rolls.title: Spicy Tuna Roll
rolls.description: Chopped tuna mixed with spicy sauce, rolled with rice and nori.

soups.title: Miso Soup
soups.description: Traditional soybean paste broth with tofu, seaweed, and green onions.

soups.title: Clear Soup
soups.description: Light broth with mushrooms and scallions, served before the meal.

drinks.title: Green Tea
drinks.description: Hot Japanese green tea served unsweetened.

drinks.title: Ramune
drinks.description: Classic Japanese carbonated soda with a marble seal.
